Intro: SPIS students will live in Marshall Residential Halls N, O, or S in Marshall College.
Title: Location

Intro: Check-in (9 am - 12 pm on [programStart]) will be at the ERC Conference Desk. Check-out (7:30 am - 9 am and 1:30 pm - 3:30 pm on [programEnd]) will be at the ERC Conference Desk.
Title: Hours

Intro: Participants may check-out early, but will need to communicate specific times prior to August 26th to Cyndi Meeves (Hospitality and Conference Services, 858-531-6625). The following information will help you locate the ERC Conference Desk and park at Pangea Parking Structure.
Title: Address
Details: 9851 North Torrey Pines Road, La Jolla CA 92093

Title: Parking
Details:
Pangea Parking Structure\\
Although parking is free on the weekends, (beginning 11pm on Friday evening through 7am Monday morning), please follow all the posted rules.
